page.title: 15 RECREATION
page.content: We interviewed 44 people to find out how they spent their time (out of a possible 66 households). Gardening was the most popular hobby according to 14 people. None of the other hobbies people mentioned were so popular. Knitting (5 votes) was a poor second.Sketching, sewing and music had three supporters each. The rest of the hobbies mentioned had only 1 supporter each. These hobbies were riding, walking a dog, painting, walking, writing, reading and golf.Between 4 p.m. and 5p.m. only 6 watch T.V., more watch between 5p.m. and 6p.m., numbering 12 watchers. The largest number, 18 view T.V. between 6p.m. and 7p.m.. At every time more people were {not}watching T.V. than {were} watching. A Drama Group is producing plays.
